sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交際法有，過於恰恰相反注重語言在語境中的運用。

sentences.english: Of course overreaction is what terrorists hope to provoke.
sentences.chinese: 當然過度反應恰恰就是恐怖分子希望看到的。

sentences.english: So this characteristic satisfies the need of the E-GOV System.
sentences.chinese: 這種特性恰恰滿足了電子政務系統開發的需要。

sentences.english: At the same time, implementation of people-centered concept of curriculum leadership to achieve this requirement exactly.
sentences.chinese: 以人爲本的課程領導理念恰恰體現了這一要求。

sentences.english: The powder room rest area, by contrast, is a very masculine decoration.
sentences.chinese: 而女廁所休息區則恰恰相反，是非常陽剛的裝修設計。

sentences.english: The universe has not forgotten you -just the opposite: It will seek you out.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙沒有忘記，恰恰相反正將凸現出來。
而在人類中卻恰恰相反。

sentences.english: We worry about what a child will become tomorrow, yet we forget that he is someone today. ----Stacia Tauscher.
sentences.chinese: 我們總擔心孩子明天會怎樣，恰恰忽視了他的今天。

sentences.english: The irony is that milk may actually lead to tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 諷刺的是牛奶或許恰恰導致蛀牙。

sentences.english: Therefore, all his progress in this context is counterproductive.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在這種環境下的進步恰恰起了反作用。

sentences.english: In 1958, won the cha-cha open champion in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 1958年，獲全港恰恰舞公開大賽冠軍。

sentences.english: It's crazy and just shows the inconsistency of refereeing.
sentences.chinese: 這太荒唐了，不過恰恰證明了裁判的前後矛盾。

sentences.english: If I learned how to disco and cha - cha.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能學會跳迪斯科和恰恰。

sentences.english: However, I found that it just connived PTB.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我發現這樣恰恰縱容了PTB。

sentences.english: Thought is already is late, exactlly is the earliest time.
sentences.chinese: 覺得爲時已晚時，恰恰是最早的時候。

sentences.english: However, under the high normal stress, the result is opposite.
sentences.chinese: 在高法嚮應力下，恰恰相反。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
as it turns out/by lucky coincidence/(of number, time, size etc) just right
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously/clearly/it goes without saying
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
